description: Heidi, a young woman with fair skin and striking green eyes takes a selfie in which she gazes directly at the viewer, wearing bright red glasses with a clear frame. Her blonde hair is styled in two braids, each secured with a small red tie at the end. Loose strands of hair frame her face, softening her features. She wears a cream-colored sweater with a delicate, patterned knit. Behind her is a well-manicured lawn with lush green grass. In the background, there is a house with a light-colored exterior and a brown roof. There are also trees and bushes, adding depth and a sense of a residential neighborhood to the scene. The overall impression is of a sunny, cheerful summer day.
